scripts.dev: yarn workspace shared run dev-start && concurrently -n "SHARED,FRONTEND,BACKEND" -c "green,red,blue" -p "[{name}]" "yarn run dev:shared" "yarn run dev:frontend" "yarn run dev:backend"
scripts.build: yarn workspace shared run build && yarn workspace client run build && yarn workspace server run build
scripts.prod: yarn run build && yarn run start
